LanguageData.US_PsychicCrush.label: psionic gravitational pressure
LanguageData.US_PsychicCrush.description: Psychic pressure crushes body parts over time, and inflicts severe debuffs on combat abilities, movement, and manipulation.
LanguageData.US_PsychicCrush.stages.crushing.label: crushing
LanguageData.US_PsychicPressure.label: psychic crush
LanguageData.US_PsychicPressure.description: A crush wound inflicted by psychically created pressure.
